channel.title: Logstash on Mark Needham
channel.description: Recent content in Logstash on Mark Needham

item.title: logstash not picking up some files
item.description: We’re using logstash to collect all the logs across the different machines that we use in various environments and had noticed that on some of the nodes log files which we’d told the logstash-client to track weren’t being collected. We wanted to check what the open file descriptors of logstash-client were so we first had to grab its process id: $ ps aux | grep logstash logstash 19896 134 9.1 711404 187768 ?
